price: 13. Dan buatlah suatu perumpamaan bagi mereka, yaitu penduduk suatu negeri, ketika utusan-utusan datang kepada mereka;
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
